sentences.en: "His memory must be completely back, then?" — "Just about."
sentences.cn: “这么说，他的记忆一定是完全恢复了？”——“差不多。”

sentences.en: Burke cast a cursory glance at the menu, then flapped it shut.
sentences.cn: 伯克匆匆地瞥了一眼菜单，然后啪地合上了。

sentences.en: Byron travelled to Italy and then to Greece.
sentences.cn: 拜伦先去意大利旅行，然后去了希腊。

sentences.en: Fluorescent lights flickered, and then the room was brilliantly, blindingly bright.
sentences.cn: 荧光灯闪了几下，接着屋子里豁然大亮，刺得人睁不开眼。

sentences.en: He skimmed the pages quickly, then read them again more carefully.
sentences.cn: 他先快速地浏览页面，然后再细细阅读。

sentences.en: He started his career in St Petersburg – or Leningrad as it then was.
sentences.cn: 他在圣彼得堡——当时叫列宁格勒——开始他的事业。

sentences.en: He then held the man in an armlock until police arrived.
sentences.cn: 然后他反扭住那名男子的手臂让他动弹不得，直到警察赶到。

sentences.en: I drain the pasta, then I share it out between two plates.
sentences.cn: 我将意大利面滤干，然后平分到两个盘子里。

sentences.en: I was paid £1,000, which was a lot of money back then (= a long time ago when things were different ) in the 1950s.
sentences.cn: 他们给了我1,000英镑，在20世纪50年代那可是一大笔钱。

sentences.en: I wish I had known then what I know now.
sentences.cn: 我真希望那时我就知道现在所知道的一切。

sentences.en: If these drugs are stopped abruptly then some withdrawal symptoms may occur.
sentences.cn: 如果突然停服这些药，则可能出现一些戒断症状。

sentences.en: it couldn't help, but then again, it probably couldn't hurt.
sentences.cn: 它没什么用，不过可能也没危害。

sentences.en: It was just then that I chanced to look round.
sentences.cn: 就在那时，我恰好环顾了下四周。

sentences.en: It was then that I realised she’d tricked me.
sentences.cn: 直到那时我才知道她骗了我。

sentences.en: Many farmers will then chase you off their land quite aggressively.
sentences.cn: 许多农民然后就会凶巴巴地把你从他们的土地上撵走。

sentences.en: Mix the flour and butter, then add the eggs.
sentences.cn: 把面粉和黄油和在一起，然后加入鸡蛋。

sentences.en: Silently she closed the door. Just then she heard a noise.
sentences.cn: 她默不作声地关上了门。 就在那时，她听到有声响。

sentences.en: The car passed over the body twice, once backward and then forward.
sentences.cn: 那辆车把那人来回轧了两次，先是倒着轧的，再是往前开着轧的。

sentences.en: The film starts off realistically and then develops into a ridiculous fantasy.
sentences.cn: 电影以写实开头，然后却发展成为荒诞的幻想。

sentences.en: Then something seemed to snap in me. I couldn't endure any more.
sentences.cn: 这时候，我的心里像有个东西突然绷断了——我再也忍受不了啦。

sentences.en: They met in 1942 and from then on (= starting at that time ) they were firm friends.
sentences.cn: 他们1942年认识，从那时起就一直是好朋友。

sentences.en: This project will take all our skill and then some.
sentences.cn: 这个工程将采用我们所有的技术，而且远不止此

sentences.en: This then was the situation facing the government at the end of the war.
sentences.cn: 这就是战争结束时摆在政府面前的情况。

sentences.en: Well, I'll take your word for it then, love.
sentences.cn: 唔，那我就信你吧，亲爱的。

sentences.en: You have to do everything you can. You have to work your hardest. And if you do, if you stay positive, then you have a shot at a silver lining.
sentences.cn: 你必须全力以赴，最大限度地去努力。如果你这么做，并且保持乐观，你就会看见乌云背后的幸福线。

sentences.en: Your partner should then pass the ball back to you.
sentences.cn: 然后你的搭档应该将球回传给你。

words.tran_cn: 于是,此外,而且,另一方面

phrases.tran_cn: conj. 即使那样；即使在那时

trans.tran_cn: 那时，然后，那么，话说回来
trans.tran_en: at a particular time in the past or future
